page.title: 05RELIGION
page.content: 2 centres of worship are found in the block - Christ Church, Bulkington,CofE (Vicar,Seend) and the Methodist Chapel Keevil(Minister,Calne). Residents also belong to the C of E parishes of St. Leonards,Keevil (Vicar,Steeple Ashton) and Christ Church, Worton (Vicar, Potterne). The future of the Methodist Chapel is under discussion; the chapel in Bulkington closed in 1967 and is now the Village Hall. Roman Catholics travel to Trowbridge and Melksham. An outreaching factor of the two churches is the free monthly magazines distrib- uted to all households. In addition to church and parish matters, details are given of community activities. Also a personal welcome is made to newcomers. Approx 13 attend Keevil Sunday School; 8-11s have an evening Junior Club.1832 Tayler Charity Trust still provides for buns to children at Easter.
